Solar-Powered Umbrella: An umbrella that is powered by solar energy, making it environmentally friendly and cost-effective. This can be achieved by incorporating solar panels into the design of the umbrella.

Waterproof Umbrella: An umbrella that is completely waterproof, ensuring that users stay dry even in the heaviest of rainstorms. This can be achieved by using special materials in the construction of the umbrella.

Multi-Colored Umbrella: An umbrella that can change colors with the push of a button, allowing users to express their personal style and mood. This can be achieved by incorporating LED lights into the design of the umbrella.

Smart Umbrella: An umbrella that can connect to a user's smartphone and provide real-time weather updates, as well as offer suggestions on the best route to take to avoid bad weather. This can be achieved by incorporating Bluetooth and GPS technology into the design of the umbrella.

Compact Umbrella: An umbrella that can be easily folded and stored in a small space, making it ideal for people who live in small apartments or have limited storage space. This can be achieved by using a collapsible design and incorporating a carrying case.
